issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).

comment.body:
> I've been using AdGuard to block ads on YahooMail, sometimes having to do it manually until they go away at the top of the list. However, in the past few days, it seems to have stopped blocking the ads, and when I click "Block Ads Manually", it does absolutely nothing. Before, it would let me click around elements on the site, choosing exactly what I'm trying to block, and now it does nothing at all.

Hi. Please check on https://adguard.com/test.html Do you see ads only on this site, or also on another, where ads were blocked?

comment.body:
It seems that it has been fixed already in - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/2b222f593ca5a1294460aa73fc741f5fc49299fd


The problem is that, unfortunately, MV3 extension cannot update filters due to Google policy, so new rules will be available in one of the next extension updates.
Until then, please add following rules to user rules:
```adblock
check-host.net#@#div[class]:has(> [class] > [src*=".svg"])
check-host.net##div[class]:has(> [class] > [src*="close"])
```

I checked the logs, and it seems to be this rule in `AdGuard – Popup Overlays` that is causing the issue:
`@@||cdn.snigelweb.com/adengine/civitai.com/loader.js$from=civitai.com`

After I disabled this rule, the ads stopped appearing
